fields.summary: Cloudformation Template to Create a Bucket Doesn't Work for non-admin user

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I have a couple stacks in "DELETE_FAILED" state and they just hang around. The reason is that they try to delete a bucket that no longer exist.  {{euform-delete-stack}} should check for bucket existence prior to attempting to delete a stack.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.1.0
Release     : 0.0.22816.240.20141124git0458434.el6

euform-describe-stacks
{code}
[root@a-25 ~]# euform-describe-stacks
STACK	bucketsman3	DELETE_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to delete: [Bucket2].		2014-12-02T23:57:23.248Z
STACK	TemplateURLTest1417564099	DELETE_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to delete: [Bucket1, Bucket2].		2014-12-02T23:48:19.579Z
{code}

attempt to delete one of the stacks showing debug output
{code}
[root@a-25 ~]# euform-delete-stack bucketsman3 --debug
2014-12-02 20:49:13,552 DEBUG   DeleteStack parsed arguments: {'force': False, 'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': None, 'StackName': 'bucketsman3', 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None}
2014-12-02 20:49:13,552 INFO    Config finding global option default-region

2014-12-02 20:49:13,559 INFO    CloudFormation sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2014-12-02 20:49:13,561 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.111.5.67:8773\n/services/CloudFormation\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIEMK4MHZFGRIM695NQ&Action=DeleteStack&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&StackName=bucketsman3&Timestamp=2014-12-03T04%3A49%3A13Z&Version=2010-05-15'
2014-12-02 20:49:13,562 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: OZ9JNG0xHh0WO+E1bUe+IStZYxjz79WQ9QpXMz16Z3o=
2014-12-02 20:49:13,562 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data

2014-12-02 20:49:13,576 DEBUG   CloudFormation request header: Content-Length: 237

2014-12-02 20:49:13,577 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   Action: DeleteStack

fields.summary: CloudFormation: delete stack does not check for bucket existence

comments.body:
[~ethomas],

I re-ran through this after touching base with [~tony] on this.  From my understanding, the bucket was deleted after the stack successfully created, then DeleteStack was ran.  I followed those steps, however nothing is returned in response:
{code}
# euform-create-stack --template-file cfn-osg-bucket-template.json BucketStack --region admin-hspencer@group1
arn:aws:cloudformation::617513010345:stack/BucketStack/4e73f814-bd5f-42f0-af58-f9ff3573862d

# euform-describe-stacks --region admin-hspencer@group1
STACK	BucketStack	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Cloudformation Example => Create bucket with public-read access control list (ACL)	2014-12-22T20:08:03.716Z
OUTPUT	BucketName	bucketstack-s3bucket-ackmdxkqrttdc

# ./s3cmd/s3cmd --config=.s3cfg-admin-hspencer-group1 --signature-v2 ls
2014-12-22 20:00  s3://bucket-creation-test
2014-12-22 20:08  s3://bucketstack-s3bucket-ackmdxkqrttdc
2014-12-19 19:36  s3://ubuntu-vivid-server-amd64-19122014

# ./s3cmd/s3cmd --config=.s3cfg-admin-hspencer-group1 --signature-v2 rb s3://bucketstack-s3bucket-ackmdxkqrttdc
Bucket 's3://bucketstack-s3bucket-ackmdxkqrttdc/' removed

# euform-delete-stack BucketStack --region admin-hspencer@group1

# euform-describe-stack-events BucketStack --region admin-hspencer@group1
#

# euform-describe-stack-resources -n BucketStack --region admin-hspencer@group1
#

# euform-describe-stacks BucketStack --region admin-hspencer@group1
#
{code}

When a stack doesn't exist anymore on AWS, the following is returned:
{code}
$ aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name BucketStackV2 --profile tessai-work

A client error (ValidationError) occurred when calling the DescribeStacks operation: Stack:BucketStackV2 does not exist
{code}

[~hspencer]  One issue I see from the original template you have here is the line "DeletionPolicy" : "Retain" .  This will not delete the bucket after the stack is deleted.

In addition, what is the current status of the bug?  The last comment you gave and the error message it describes warrants filing a new bug.
Issue was in fact fixed and verified. Thanks for your work on this [~hspencer].
